18 #ifndef GANDIVA_BITMAP_ACCUMULATOR_H
19 #define GANDIVA_BITMAP_ACCUMULATOR_H
20 
21 #include <vector>
22 
23 #include "gandiva/dex.h"
24 #include "gandiva/dex_visitor.h"
25 #include "gandiva/eval_batch.h"
26 
27 namespace gandiva {
28 
31 class BitMapAccumulator : public DexDefaultVisitor {
32  public:
33  explicit BitMapAccumulator(const EvalBatch& eval_batch)
34  : eval_batch_(eval_batch), all_invalid_(false) {}
35 
36  void Visit(const VectorReadValidityDex& dex) {
37  int idx = dex.ValidityIdx();
38  auto bitmap = eval_batch_.GetBuffer(idx);
39  src_maps_.push_back(bitmap);
40  }
41 
42  void Visit(const LocalBitMapValidityDex& dex) {
43  int idx = dex.local_bitmap_idx();
44  auto bitmap = eval_batch_.GetLocalBitMap(idx);
45  src_maps_.push_back(bitmap);
46  }
47 
48  void Visit(const TrueDex& dex) {
49  // bitwise-and with 1 is always 1. so, ignore.
50  }
51 
52  void Visit(const FalseDex& dex) {
53  // The final result is "all 0s".
54  all_invalid_ = true;
55  }
56 
58  void ComputeResult(uint8_t* dst_bitmap);
59 
62  static void IntersectBitMaps(uint8_t* dst_map, const std::vector<uint8_t*>& src_maps,
63  int num_records);
64 
65  private:
66  const EvalBatch& eval_batch_;
67  std::vector<uint8_t*> src_maps_;
68  bool all_invalid_;
69 };
70 
71 } // namespace gandiva
72 
73 #endif // GANDIVA_BITMAP_ACCUMULATOR_H
